page.title: 10GLYNARTHEN, DYFED
page.content:
My name is Dylan, I live in Alltgoch and go to{Glynarthen}school. I am ten and have a brother and 3 sisters. My mum and dad work on a big farm, we have a lot of animals. My grandfather has a car and tractor and lives on a small farm. My dad has a car & 3 tractors. Dylan Davies
My name is Elen, I have a brother and sister, their names are Dylan & Sian. I am 9. We live in {Ty Capel.}Dad {works in Pontygronw,} mum looks after a little boy and girl called Jami and Emma. I go to {Sunday School}and {church,}Dylan goes to{Llandysul school. I like sewing, knitting, collecting flowers and bottles. I play the recorder and piano. I like going shopping for toys. We have a Hamster called Harry. Elen Evans aged 9.
